name: arctonic
description: example arc.codes app with auth flow, data persistence and JS frontend powered by tonic.technology
author: Fil Maj <me@filmaj.ca>

scripts.build: npx components --css public/css/tonic.css && npx components public/js/tonic-components.mjs --include 'router button input' && sed -i.bak 's/module.exports =/export default/' public/js/tonic-components.mjs && rm public/js/tonic-components.mjs.bak
